short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension is free and every new Tab you will get motivational image every time and todo list, Speed test function

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can see all of your necessary information.

Now you don't need to search another website to look at about your internet speed and now you can get better experience for every new tab with great images.

Easily you can see all of your info that website look at you.
